title: Daniel Lopez
text:
Experience

UCSD - Office for Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion

2022 - Present | San Diego, CA
Excel: Played a proactive role in gathering, intricately organizing, and meticulously analyzing data, utilizing Excel extensively. This substantial contribution significantly propelled the progress of ongoing diversity research projects.
Efficiany: Showcased adeptness in employing software and tools, including Microsoft Office and Google Suite, to handle tasks ranging from data management and intricate scheduling to facilitating streamlined communication.



Entrepreneur

2020-2023 | San Francisco, CA
Entrepreneurship: Purchased items in order to resell them for profit, with an average profit margin of 75%.
Market Research: Researched market trends to find items that would provide the highest profit margins and have low turn around times.
Excel: Used to excel to keep track of inventory, business costs, retinue, profits, return on investment, and a balalance sheets.

title: Daniel Lopez
text:
Hello, and thank you for visiting my personal website. I’m a senior at UCSD majoring in Business Economics, a dynamic professional with a passion for economics, data analytics, and fostering diversity and inclusion. Let me give you a glimpse into my academic and professional journey.
Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my journey, projects, and the skills I bring to any team or project. Connect with me on LinkedIn, I’m excited about the possibilities, and I look forward to connecting with you!
